Package com.beepell.execution.transaction

Interface Summary
Transaction  
 

Class Summary
FlatTransactionTest Testing the lock manager and the locks.
Lock The lock for an object.
LockManager The Lock Manager Class - manages all locks.
NestedTransactionTest Test nested transactions.
TransactionImpl  
 

Enum Summary
LockType There are two types of locks: (shared) read lock and (exclusive) write lock.
